short_summary:
Trade Agreement: NONE
Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid
Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No
Nature of Requirements: 

Canada is seeking proposals from qualified Offerors to provide 3D Terrestrial Scanners to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans as defined in the Annex - Statement of Requirement.

Delivery Date: 02/12/2024

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
description: Numériseurs terrestre 3D et licences.\n\nLa demande est faite des numriseurs propris de haute qualité qui pourrent fonctionner avec les systés OFF basinus.
